title: NBA Finals Tip-Off
description:
Tony Kornheiser and Michael Wilbon discuss whether they have the Celtics or Warriors in the NBA Finals, what is a better story in the French Open; Gauff or Swiatek, and Drew Timme returning to Gonzaga for his senior season.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Tony Kornheiser, Michael Wilbon
itunes:subtitle: PTI: The NBA Finals tip-off tonight and the Rangers beat the Lightning in Game 1
